name: linnet-packages
author: Owen Kelly <owen@owenkelly.com.au>
description: Create, update and manage your AWS AppSync API

scripts.build:lambda: yarn lambda:clean && yarn lambda:init && yarn lambda:createDirs && yarn lambda:build && yarn lambda:zip
scripts.lambda:init: find packages/lambda/ -type d -maxdepth 1 -mindepth 1 -exec bash -c 'cd {} && npm install' \;
scripts.lambda:build: find packages/lambda/ -type d -maxdepth 1 -mindepth 1 -exec bash -c ' cd {} && pwd && yarn build' \;
scripts.lambda:zip: ls -t packages/lambda | head -n 3 | xargs -I '{}' bash -c 'cd packages/lambda/{} && zip -rq ../../../.dist/lambda/{}.zip  ./*'
scripts.docs: typedoc src/index.ts --excludePrivate --mode file --theme minimal --out lib/docs && opn lib/docs/index.html
